p: Iran is a country with an area of 1,648,000 km 2 located in the Middle East with a diverse climate [ 22]. Among the studied provinces during 2017, Ilam and Sistan & Baluchestan had the highest (398.8 mmHg) and the lowest (28.7 mmHg) average annual rainfall respectively [ 23]. Khuzestan had the highest (50.4 °C) maximum temperature and Ilam had the lowest (−8.9 °C) minimum temperature [ 24].
